p: The wells with no visible growth were selected and samples were used to determine the MBC and MFC. Briefly, after homogenization, a loop of each suspension was cultured on LB agar or SDA, respectively. This culture was incubated aerobically at 37°C for 24 h for bacteria or 48 h at 35°C for Candida. The MBC or MFC of each was estimated from the culture medium in which no visible microbial growth was recorded upon examination. The tests were performed in triplicate and repeated twice
